name: Hanoi Dreamy House
address: 33 Luong Ngoc Quyen, Old Quarter, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Situated in Hanoi, Hanoi Dreamy House offers self-catering accommodation with free WiFi. The air-conditioned unit is 300 metres from Thang Long Water Puppet Theater.

The kitchen features a microwave. A flat-screen TV is offered.

Old City Gate is 300 metres from Hanoi Dreamy House, while Ngoc Son Temple is 400 metres from the property. Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km away.
